about_the_game:
Story

When you wake up, you find that the evening class has ended, and there is only you left in the entire classroom.
After simply complaining that your friend is unreliable, you made plans to go home.
But this classroom doesn't seem to want you to leave here so easily.

Purchase Notice

You need to find some clues in repeated loop scenes, break free from the loop, and be able to leave the classroom.
In the loop, you may experience some terrifying things, but please rest assured that you can definitely break free from the loop of the classroom.
This game does not contain any other decryption elements, the only thing you need to do is crack the loop and leave the classroom!

This is a small horror game that has no save and is in the same enclosed environment.
If you are afraid of the dark, please increase the gamma value for the best gaming experience.

Special Tips

Facing unknown situations, please carefully distinguish whether it will lead to death.

Trying to experience more floors may help you find a way to leave.

Pay attention to the leftover notes and combine them with special numbers to quickly find the exit.

name: Loop:ClassRoom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Inter Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Inter Core i7 4770 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Every school has some terrifying rumors, and you certainly don't want to be a part of these rumors.
